verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Amos, <WH5986> who was among the herdsmen <WH5349> of Tekoa, <WH8620> which he saw <WH2372> concerning Israel <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah <WH5818> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> and in the days <WH3117> of Jeroboam <WH3379> the son <WH1121> of Joash <WH3101> king <WH4428> of Israel, <WH3478> two years <WH8141> before <WH6440> the earthquake. <WH7494>
